import React from "react"; import './text.scss' interface TextProps { children: any, color?: string type?: 'h1' | 'h2' | 'h3' | 'h4' | 'paragraph' | 'span' | 'a' } const Text = ({children, type, color}: TextProps) => { switch(type) { case 'h1': return

{children}

case 'h2': return

{children}

case 'h3': return

{children}

case 'h4': return

{children}

case 'paragraph': return

{children}

case 'a': return {children} case 'span': return {children} default: return {children} } } export default Text
